title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.65 - Hearings; evidence as to transactions had at conferences
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.65 - Hearings; evidence as to transactions had at conferences

State Regulations

No testimony or evidence shall be given or received at
any hearing concerning transactions had or statements or communications made
during the conduct or course of any conference called and held concerning
charges or petitions unless at the hearing all parties shall expressly waive
this provision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.65

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
